title: Use Angular Recaptcha
body: You will be able to prevent access from the bot using recaptcha. Usually, when using recaptcha, the script tag must be installed in HTML. However, use [ng-recaptcha] (https://github.com/dethariel/ng-recaptcha) because the script tag on index.html is escaped and erased. #### Install `` `zsh $ NPM I NG-RECAPTCHA `` ` #### Introduction - *.module.ts `` `TS Import {recaptChamodule} from 'NG-RECAPTCHA'; @Ngmodule ({ DECLARATIONS: [...], Imports: [..., recaptchamodule], }) `` ` - *.Component.html -In the SiteKey, enter the domain created by [gcp recaptcha] (https://cloud.google.com/recaptcha-enterprise?hl=ja). `` `HTML `` ` * We recommend that you set a test key and a deployment key. In order to check the operation when moving locally, it is necessary to add `localhost` to the recaptcha domain, but if you add it, a third party can use the key to run locally, making an unintended billing. This is because it can happen. If you use it outside the specified domain, it will be described as follows. The price is free from ~ 1000000 times/month, so most use cases will fit in the free frame.
